title: Example-Problem Integrated Learning for Strengthening Practical Accounting Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program targeting improved work efficiency for practitioners, conducted in an environment enabling smartphone-based learning.

learning_goals: Analyze real accounting cases and accurately perform accounting procedures from journal entries to financial statements.
Apply a learning method combining examples and problem-solving strategies when resolving complex accounting issues (e.g., mergers, depreciation).
Over 80% of participants derive appropriate accounting solutions for new scenarios within 2 hours post-learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
